name: Adobe
description:
Creative, marketing & document management solutions
Adobe is a global leader in digital media and digital marketing solutions, providing creative, marketing, and document solutions that empower everyone, from emerging artists to global brands. One of Adobe's widely used products is Adobe Acrobat Reader, the world's most trusted PDF reader and editor with over 635 million installs. Users can view, share, annotate, add comments, and sign documents in one app. We are known for our wide range of software products and services, including the Creative Cloud suite, which includes popular applications like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere Pro. We aim to change the world through digital experiences, helping customers create, deliver, and optimize content and applications.
features: Features

Creativity for all
We believe everybody has a story to tell. Adobe Creative Cloud unleashes creativity so anyone — from the most demanding professionals to students just starting — can make whatever they want, wherever they want.

Empowering digital businesses
Businesses count on Adobe to help them meet digital transformation challenges. With Adobe Experience Cloud, they can harness their data and deliver personalized experiences that drive business growth and customer loyalty.

Accelerating document productivity
Adobe pioneered the paper-to-digital transformation with the invention of PDF. We created Adobe Document Cloud so people can scan, edit, share, and sign documents anytime.
